body_html: Just pushed the fix for this yesterday, it should be available in the nightly build shortly. The 'uniform' initializer is known, the issue was that the default values for minval and maxval for this initializer were set too large for the model to converge. I sync'd up their defaults with those in external Keras

body: Just pushed the fix for this yesterday, it should be available in the nightly build shortly. The 'uniform' initializer is known, the issue was that the default values for `minval` and `maxval` for this initializer were set too large for the model to converge. I sync'd up their defaults with those in external Keras
